snippet.title: [c64] Juice! (1983)
snippet.description:
Published by Tronix and develeped by Arti Haroutunian. He's also responsible for the game ' Kid Grid'.

I played levels 1 & 2 and used a save in between even though I managed to get into the third level without saves in my previous attempts.

I was searching this game for a while. I was sure it was "jump" and something, but couldn't find anything with that keyword. Then I finally found the game while browsing.
This is probably the most nostalgic c64 game for me, even though many others come nearly as close. I used to play this a lot with some other early games before I got hold of games released after -84.

This is similar to ' Q*bert ' which for released for c64 at 1983 as well, but one year earlier for other platforms.

http://www.lemon64.com/games/details.php?ID=2991
